pacman.controller

Class PacmanController

  • java.lang.Object
    • pacman.controller.PacmanController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetworkController, PacmanMazeController

    public class PacmanController
extends java.lang.Object
implements PacmanMazeController, NetworkController
    This is the controller of the game Pacman.
    Version:
    1.0

      • exit

      • agentVisit

        public void agentVisit(AbstractAgent agent,
                       int x,
                       int y)
        Gets called when an agent (pacman/ghost) visits a block. It checks if the pacman meets a food (then earn scores), pellet (then earn scores and enter "ghost buster" mode), a scared ghost (then earn scores and reset the ghost), or a normal ghost (then dies). After that it updates the scores and check if game is won.
        Specified by:
        agentVisit in interface PacmanMazeController
        Parameters:
        agent - the agent of the move
        x - the current x coordinate of agent
        y - the current y coordinate of agent

      • gameOver

        public void gameOver(boolean win)
        When the game over, ask the user to restart or close.
        Parameters:
        win - if the user wins

      • hitPellets

        private void hitPellets()
        When the pacman hits a pellet, all ghosts are scared.

      • pacmanDie

        private void pacmanDie(java.lang.Integer pacmanIndex)
        When pacman meets a normal ghost, the pacman dies.
        Parameters:
        pacmanIndex - the index of the pacman

      • pacmanEat

        private void pacmanEat(java.lang.String ghostName)
        When pacman meets a scared ghost, the ghost dies.
        Parameters:
        ghostName - the name of the ghost

      • removeAgent

        public void removeAgent(AbstractAgent agent)
        Removes an agent from the game.
        Specified by:
        removeAgent in interface PacmanMazeController
        Parameters:
        agent - the agent that is about to be removed.

        Parameters:
